https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/57wDFsoKLNVgXlTceq50Am8c5nf.jpg "Because this is my last chance ..." Saori Nakazawa (Niigaki Risa)'s dream is to appear in an actress and a movie. For her, who lost her father at an early age and protected her sick mother and sister, it was her dream and a tribute to her mother. However, Saori finds out that her mother has no life expectancy and participates in an audition as her last chance. Black Film
